mapper.sql: id, third_file_name, version, status, file_storage_path, active, file_source, create_time, update_time, release_user_id, release_file_name, release_introduction, operational_mode, release_time
mapper.select: select , date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time_str, date_format(release_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') release_time_str from t_archive where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into t_archive (id, third_file_name, version, status, file_storage_path, active, file_source, create_time, update_time, release_user_id, release_file_name, release_introduction, operational_mode, release_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{thirdFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileStoragePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{active,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{releaseUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{releaseFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{releaseIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operationalMode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{releaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into t_archive
id,
third_file_name,
version,
status,
file_storage_path,
active,
file_source,
create_time,
update_time,
release_user_id,
release_file_name,
release_introduction,
operational_mode,
release_time,

mapper.update:
update t_archive
third_file_name = #{thirdFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
file_storage_path = #{fileStoragePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
active = #{active,jdbcType=INTEGER},
file_source = #{fileSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
release_user_id = #{releaseUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
release_file_name = #{releaseFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
release_introduction = #{releaseIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operational_mode = #{operationalMode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
release_time = #{releaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
type_id = #{typeId},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_archive set third_file_name = #{thirdFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, file_storage_path = #{fileStoragePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, active = #{active,jdbcType=INTEGER}, file_source = #{fileSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, release_user_id = #{releaseUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, release_file_name = #{releaseFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, release_introduction = #{releaseIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operational_mode = #{operationalMode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, release_time = #{releaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select t.id, t.third_file_name, release_file_name, release_user_id, file_storage_path, date_format(t.release_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') release_time_str, t.status, a.customer_name as release_user_name from t_archive t inner join t_user a on t.release_user_id = a.id inner join t_sys_parameter p on t.type_id = p.p_value and p.p_model = 1 and p.p_function = 2 where 1 = 1
and t.third_file_name like concat('%',#{thirdFileName},'%')
and t.type_id = #{typeId}
and t.release_user_id = #{userId} order by t.release_time desc

select t.id, t.third_file_name, release_file_name, release_user_id, file_storage_path, date_format(t.release_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') release_time_str, t.status, a.customer_name as release_user_name from t_archive t inner join t_user a on t.release_user_id = a.id inner join t_sys_parameter p on t.type_id = p.p_value and p.p_model = 1 and p.p_function = 2 inner join t_archive_user_relation d on t.id = d.archive_id and d.user_id = #{userId} where 1 = 1
and t.third_file_name like concat('%',#{thirdFileName},'%')
and t.type_id = #{typeId}
and t.release_user_id = #{userId} order by t.release_time desc
